contentencoded:
Former Groupon CEO Andrew Mason released a motivational music album late last night on iTunes. He says the album, Hardly Workin', is meant to help people get ahead in the workplace. Our question: Is Groupon going to offer a coupon for the album? Either way, you can hear more here.

Click on the audio player above to hear a sample from the "K.I.S.S." -- a song praising the design style of former Apple CEO Steve Jobs.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, July 2, 2013
teaser: Groupon’s ousted founder Andrew Mason thinks he has some business wisdom to impart. So, he’s cut an inspiration album.
title: Groupon founder tries hand at motivational music
